definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: silence, still waiting, repose—Ps 39:3 silence; Ps 62:2 still waiting, resignation (Dr:§ 189. 2; but rd. prob., as v:Ps 62:6, [[דּׂמִּי]], Bi Gr Che); Ps 65:2 id. (but Ew Che Bä al. [[דּׂמִיׇּה]] is meet ? fr. I. [[דָּמָה]], LXX pre/pei, v. Che); Ps 22:3 repose (fr. grief and tears: Je 14:17).
